channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Announcing Public Preview of Microsoft Sentinel in Azure China 21Vianet
item.description:
Over the last few months, we have been working hard to bring the Microsoft Sentinel experience to Azure China. Microsoft Azure operated by 21Vianet (Azure China) is a physically separated instance of cloud services located in China. This allows customers in China to adhere to local regulations.
Today, we are happy to announce that Microsoft Sentinel is now available in Public Preview in the China East 2 region. This means that customers in China can now leverage the advanced threat detection and response capabilities of Microsoft Sentinel to protect their cloud and on-premises workloads. Eve...
